title: Texto OCR
description: A simple web app to extract text found in images. This project was created using Phoenix and Elixir.
author: Edgar Pino

title: Meeseeks
description: An Elixir library for parsing and extracting data from HTML and XML with CSS or XPath selectors.
author: Mischov

title: FunWithFlags
description: FunWithFlags is an OTP application that provides a 2-level storage to save and retrieve feature flags, an Elixir API to toggle and query them, and a web dashboard as control panel.
author: Tommaso Pavese

title: RemoteRetro
description: A real-time application for conducting Agile retrospectives with distributed teams.
author: Travis Vander Hoop

title: Credo
description: A static code analysis tool for the Elixir language with a focus on code consistency and teaching.
author: René Föhring

title: Pickpocket
description: Pickpocket helps Millennials and their loved ones repay student debt by taking a percentage of their spending and using it to pay down their student loans.
author: Will Gilman

title: Sprint Poker
description: Easiest tool for your team's regular weekly sprint planning sessions.
author: Michał Kalbarczyk

title: ElixirFiddle
description: Experiment and share Elixir code with others!
author: KickinEspresso

title: Talkery
description: Talkery is a free platform for finding and staying up to date with the newest and greatest talks in the topics you’re interested in. It allows you to filter conference talks by topics (e.g. React, Rails, Rust) as well as conferences (e.g. GOTO 2017). It also allows you to follow these topics and get notified when new talks are released.
author: Harrison Lucas

title: Alchemist Camp
author: Alchemist Camp
description: Alchemist Camp is a resource with several dozen free screencasts for learning Elixir and Phoenix. It's mostly longer-form, project based episodes.

title: StatWatch
author: Alchemist Camp
description: StatWatch is a simple stat-tracking app that will record how many twitter followers, YouTube subscribers, YouTube views you have as well as the Alexa Rank of your site.

title: Code::Stats
author: Nicd
description: Free stats tracking service for programmers.

title: Almost Dead .net
author: alxndr
description: Still a work in progress... Keeping track of setlists played by the band Joe Russo's Almost Dead.

title: Fryse
author: Phillipp Ohlandt
description: A Static Site Generator which aims to be generic and scriptable

title: Crypto Coin Prices
author: Marcos B. L.
description: Crypto Coin Prices provide tools, prices and tickers comparison directly from exchanges!

title: Magnetissimo
author: Sergio Tapia
description: Scrapes torrent sites and serves results.

title: Cooking With Link
author: Geoffrey Lessel
description: Search for and filter Zelda: Breath of the Wild cooking recipes.
